column1: Onions—Average retail price per pound and per cup equivalent, 2016

1Excludes varieties such as scallions, shallots, pearl onions, and cioppini onions. The USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference (SR) reports that 10 percent of raw onions is refuse. It is assumed that fresh onions are consumed raw.

Source: Calculated by USDA, Economic Research Service, from 2016 IRI Infoscan data; USDA National Nutrient Database for Standard Reference (SR), Release 26; and the Food Patterns Equivalents Database (FPED) 2013-14 as well as the FPED's accompanying Methodology and User Guide.
